enum  { Left, Right, Center }

Detailed Description

All graphics widgets.

This namespace contains all the graphics widgets

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

This enumeration defines the position of an item (such as text). It is used by widget to define autoposition (like Button which has SetTextPosition...)

Enumerator:
Left  Object is on the left.
Right  Object is on the right.
Center  Object is centered.
